meanings.definition: Holding or based on a mistaken or incorrect belief
meanings.sent1: Her wrongheaded decision led to a lot of trouble.
meanings.sent2: It's wrongheaded to think that all cats hate water.
meanings.sent3: The wrongheaded idea that eating ice cream for breakfast is healthy made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: His wrongheaded belief that the moon is made of cheese is quite amusing.
meanings.sent5: The consequences of his wrongheaded choice were immediate and severe.

meanings.definition: Stubbornly or unreasonably holding to one's own opinions or beliefs
meanings.sent1: The wrongheaded man refused to listen to any other suggestions.
meanings.sent2: She can be quite wrongheaded when it comes to trying new foods.
meanings.sent3: His wrongheaded insistence on wearing shorts in the snow always surprises us.
meanings.sent4: The team's wrongheaded strategy of never passing the ball cost them the game.
meanings.sent5: The CEO's wrongheaded decision to ignore customer feedback led to a drop in sales.
